thread.title: The Scary Things That Happen When You Don't Get Enough Sleep

author: Dominique Astorino
title: The Scary Things That Happen When You Don't Get Enough Sleep
text:
What Happens When You Don't Sleep The Scary Things That Happen When You Don't Get Enough Sleep February 27, 2017 by Dominique Astorino 107 Shares 
Sleeping is one of those things that we all say we're going to do more of . . . and then never actually do. But it's a more serious problem than you think. While we were getting serious about drinking more water and adding more sleep to our schedules , we began to wonder what would happen if we didn't follow through. We know what happens when you don't drink water (it's scary), but what about when you don't sleep? Related: 
As it turns out, the effects can be crazy serious â€” and weight gain isn't even the worst of it. Milder Effects 
In the earlier stages, you'll experience effects like: Stress
